entry.title: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 10:58AM AKST until January 06 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS
entry.summary: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Snow and blowing snow with low visibility expected. Travel will be very difficult. Visibility of one half mile or less at times is expected. Total snow accumulations of up to one inch are expected.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued January 05 at 2:35PM EST by NWS
entry.summary: ...ICY SPOTS POSSIBLE LATER TONIGHT... Leftover moisture from rainfall earlier today may result in areas of black ice later tonight across interior southern New England as temperatures fall below freezing. If you plan on driving later tonight, be alert that roads that appear to be wet may actually be icy.
